title: Thomas Phinney - where are you?
content:
would you mind to see my first font; and tell me what do you think? thank you

[http://typophile.com/node/14419](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108183838/http:/typophile.com/node/14419 "http://typophile.com/node/14419")
author: parker

comments.content: He just did an interview with InDesign Magazine. Very cool

Hmmm. Seems like I'm a little late to the party! I was looking for an old posting of mine, and ran into this. I'll go take a look....

T
